DataElement.preferredName: Lesion Description Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors Target Flag java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any visible abnormal structural change in a bodily part.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._Standard parameters to be used when documenting response of solid tumors to treatment; a set of published rules that define when cancer patients improve ("respond"), stay the same ("stable"), or worsen ("progression") during treatments. (from www.recist.com):An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.
